Serialized Form

Package de.thinktel.foragingBee.masonGlue

Class de.thinktel.foragingBee.masonGlue.ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation extends sim.engine.SimState implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -2187248402977949189L

Serialized Fields

is3dMode

boolean is3dMode
A flag indicating if this simulation shall run in a 3d simulation environment.

avoidObstacles

boolean avoidObstacles
Set it to true if obstacles (other agents) are to be avoided.

maxBees

int maxBees
The maximum number of bees in the simulation. This value is defined protected only because a parametrizing subclass has to access this property.

comNoise

double comNoise
The communication problems between bees. It is noise when transferring information.

pForgettingSource

double pForgettingSource
A value describing the probability a bee forgets its source in every iteration step.

pStartScouting

double pStartScouting
A value describing the probability to start scouting.

pForagingAgain

double pForagingAgain
A value describing the probability to forage again if the be returned from foraging.

colonyNectarNeed

double colonyNectarNeed
The general urge the colony needs some nectar. This is a highly aggregated variable including several aspects.

maxSearchSteps

int maxSearchSteps
A value describing the maximum steps for a bee searching a food source.

maxAgentSphereRadius

double maxAgentSphereRadius
The maximum sphere radius of all objects in the simulation.

agents

java.util.Vector<E> agents
All agents in the simulation.

hives

java.util.Vector<E> hives
All hives of type Hive in the simulation.

foodSources

java.util.Vector<E> foodSources
All food sources of type FoodSource in the simulation.

obstacles

java.util.Vector<E> obstacles
All obstacles of type Obstacle in the simulation.

bees

java.util.Vector<E> bees
All bees of type Bee.

Class de.thinktel.foragingBee.masonGlue.dimension2.AgentVisualization2DCube extends AgentVisualization2D implements Serializable

Class de.thinktel.foragingBee.masonGlue.dimension2.AgentVisualization2DSpheric extends AgentVisualization2D implements Serializable

Class de.thinktel.foragingBee.masonGlue.dimension2.ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation2D extends ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -1024692455552577435L

Serialized Fields

environment

sim.field.continuous.Continuous2D environment
An environment the agents are moving in. This object has to be created in an early stage because it will referenced during the creation of agents because on creation agents will update their location. The locations are stored in the ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation2D.environment object.

Package de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation

Class de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.AbstractMovingAgent extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 7815716363922534915L

Serialized Fields

is3dMode

boolean is3dMode
Determine if this agent is running in a 3D simulation environment. Some methods may behave differently according to this flag.

visual

IAgentVisualization visual
The object that is used for visualizing this agent. The simulation environment is not known so no knowledge of the type is given.

schedulerInformation

java.lang.Object schedulerInformation
Information to access the scheduler for this agent.

simulation

ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation simulation
The simulation the agent is dealing with.

location

javax.vecmath.Point3d location
The current location of the agent.

velocity

javax.vecmath.Vector3d velocity
The current speed vector of the agent.

heading

J3dPolar heading
This variable contains the heading. The heading itself contains the orientation (azimuth) that the angle in radians inside the xy-plane and the elevation that is the angle between the positive x-axis and the projection of the vector onto the xy-plane.

size

double size
The size of the agent.

radius

double radius
The radius of the object.

Class de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.Bee extends AbstractMovingAgent implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -6693732612451071979L

Serialized Fields

hive

Hive hive
The hive where the bee belongs to.

foodSource

FoodSource foodSource
The source of food the bee remembers, either by information or by the last foraging trip.

sourceConcentration

double sourceConcentration
The concentration of nectar for the last remembered source.

sourceDirection

J3dPolar sourceDirection
The calculated direction from the hives entrance to the source. The radius is the computed distance to the source. The distance to the source will be altered by the bee during flight.

currentTargetLocation

javax.vecmath.Point3d currentTargetLocation
The current target location the bee will heading to. This point is necessary if the bee is avoiding obstacles because after the avoidance the new direction has to recomputed.

nectarLoad

double nectarLoad
The current nectar load retrieved from a source.

sourceQuality

double sourceQuality
The computed quality of the last source.

foragingCosts

double foragingCosts
The costs for doing foraging (the last trip).

state

Bee.State state
The current state of the bee.

receptive

boolean receptive
True if the bee is receptive to other bees, used to listen to other dancing bees.

repeatedDance

int repeatedDance
A counter for the statistics how often a bee is successive dancing.

dancingThreshold

double dancingThreshold
The probability a bee will start dancing. This value also affects the duration of dancing. Every step the probability the value is reduced. Distinctive values represent certain states:
  • -1: no dancing
  • [0,1[: no dancing, set this value to -1
  • >=1: dancing

dancingTime

int dancingTime
The number of cycles the bee invests in dancing.

repeatedTrip

int repeatedTrip
The number of successive trips to the same food source.

searchSteps

int searchSteps
The remaining number of search steps the bee will perform until giving up searching.

Class de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.FoodSource extends AbstractMovingAgent implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

sizeFactor

double sizeFactor
A factor computed once to compute the current concentration of nectar in this food source.

initialConcentration

double initialConcentration
The initial nectar concentration in this source.

concentration

double concentration
The current nectar concentration in this source.

amount

double amount
The current amount of nectar in this source. The amount is the product of concentration multiplied with the size of the food source.

beeCount

int beeCount
A counter that will increased by FoodSource.beeLock() and decreased by FoodSource.beeUnlock().

refillFactor

double refillFactor
This factor determines the speed the nectar concentration is refilled until the initial value. This factor determines the fraction of the differenz of the current concentration to the initial one.

maxAbsoluteRefill

double maxAbsoluteRefill
The maximum value the refilling will happen every step. This value clamps the computed using the FoodSource.refillFactor variable.
